text: The Phantom of Liberty is a 1974 French Italian comedy movie directed by Luis Buñuel. It stars Adriana Asti, Julien Bertheau, Jean-Claude Brialy, Adolfo Celi, Anne-Marie Deschodt, Michael Lonsdale. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Luis Buñuel
title: The Phantom of Liberty
